mapper.select: SELECT temp_sql AS tempsql FROM `lims_temp_info` WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT ltf.id, ltf.temp_path as tempPath, ltf.temp_sql AS tempsql, ltf.labor, ltf.temp_type AS tempType, ltf.create_time AS createTime FROM lims_temp_info AS ltf WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT ltf.id, ltf.temp_path as tempPath, ltf.temp_sql AS tempsql, ltf.labor, ltf.temp_type AS tempType, ltf.create_time AS createTime FROM lims_temp_info AS ltf WHERE ltf.task_id = #{taskId}
